Title: Allegiant
Writer: Noah Oppenheim (screenplay by), Adam Cooper (screenplay by), Bill Collage (screenplay by), Veronica Roth (based on the novel "Allegiant" by)
Actors: Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Naomi Watts, Octavia Spencer
Plot: After the earth-shattering revelations of Insurgent, Tris must escape with Four beyond the wall that encircles Chicago, to finally discover the shocking truth of the world around them.
